## SARA Education Trust

- A registered charitable education institute in India.

::: centering

![5 April 2023 -- classes started at the SARA.](images/terra-sara.jpg){width="80%"}
:::

## Our Mission 

- To empower underrepresented communities in India by providing data science education.

::: {layout-ncol=2 layout-valign="bottom" .centering}

![Public Meeting in Rajasthan.](images/visit-rj.jpg)
